task_instructions:
You are working on a codebase. Your task is to make the necessary code changes to accomplish the following:

Adjust index creation for dense vector telemetry tests

In 8.x we need to have bwc back to when before `element_type: byte` existed. To prevent loss of coverage for past versions & telemetry, here I move the index creation around so that we only create with `byte` when we have the more recent telemetry changes (and thus also `byte` elements).

closes: https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/114556

Please make all necessary code changes to complete this task.
synthesized_task_instructions: Adjust index creation for dense vector telemetry tests to ensure BWC compatibility by only creating byte element type indices when the telemetry changes support it
